name: Advanced GeoIP
description: Advanced GeoIP filtering app for PostHog

config.name: Discard IP addresses after GeoIP?
config.hint: Whether IP addresses should be discarded after doing GeoIP lookup.

config.name: Discard GeoIP for libraries
config.hint: Comma-separated list of libraries ($lib) for which GeoIP should be ignored (e.g. `posthog-node,posthog-python`)
